sectionDescription: Explore our recent events and initiatives that impact the community and promote local culture.

items.title: Olympic Golf
items.description: Olympic golf championship held in Rio
items.longText: The Olympic Golf Championship brought together athletes from around the world in Rio de Janeiro. It was a historic event marking the return of golf as an Olympic sport.

items.title: Fertilizer Expo
items.longText: The Fertilizer Expo showcased the latest innovations in plant nutrition, bringing together suppliers, researchers, and agricultural producers from around the globe.

items.title: Beach Boxing Project
items.description: Social initiative offering outdoor boxing classes
items.longText: The Beach Boxing Project brings health and sports culture to coastal communities, offering free classes and promoting an active lifestyle.

items.title: Clean Bay Cleanup
items.description: Community cleanup action in Guanabara Bay
items.longText: The Clean Bay Cleanup mobilized volunteers and NGOs in a large operation to remove solid waste from the shoreline, improving water quality and raising public awareness.
details: Support from city governments and companies

items.title: Aqua Bossa
items.longText: Aqua Bossa combines live music, gourmet food trucks, and street art, celebrating beach culture in a family-friendly event.

items.title: Pipoca Carioca
items.description: Outdoor cinema screenings by the waterfront
items.longText: Pipoca Carioca screens classic films under the stars, bringing culture and free entertainment to the local community.
details: Sponsored by the Department of Culture

items.title: Aqua Park Grand Opening
items.description: Opening of the new themed water park
items.longText: The Aqua Park inaugurated its new thrilling attractions, featuring interactive water slides and leisure areas for all ages.
